pkgmetadata.longdescription:
micro_httpd is a miniscule HTTP/1.0 server designed to be run from inetd. It's not high performance, but is more than adequate for very low-volume usage (simple testing, HTTP netboot, LAN file sharing, etc).
It covers all the basic features expected of a minimalistic HTTP server: * Secure against '..' filename snooping. * Common MIME types * Training-slash redirection * index.html * Directory listings
